description: Complete system overview including the architecture, core components, and interactions between newspaper download, storage, and email distribution subsystems
Detailed documentation of the newspaper acquisition workflow including authentication strategies, download mechanisms, and content validation algorithms
Documentation of the dual-provider storage system, archival logic, and data retention policies for managing the rolling 7-day newspaper archive
Technical details of the email distribution system including template generation, preview thumbnail creation, and archive link management
End-to-end data flow documentation showing how newspaper content moves through download, storage, preview generation, and email distribution stages
